name: Jim
welcomeDes: Delivering insight through data for a better Canada.
termAndConditionContent: The following Terms of Use arise from Statistics Canada's character as a public institution that must operate transparently and in conformity with the provisions of federal legislation, notably, but not exclusively, the Statistics Act, the Privacy Act and the Access to Information Act.
termAndConditionContent_a: Statistics Canada (StatCan) maintains the StatsCAN app (“the app”) to provide Canadians with key information on Canada’s economy, society and environment. It provides an overview of new information available from Statistics Canada. By using the app, you are agreeing to these Terms of Use.
termAndConditionContent_b: These Terms of Use govern your use of this app and this agreement is between you and Statistics Canada only. Statistics Canada is solely responsible for this app and its content.
termAndConditionContent_c: If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, select Cancel and delete the app.
termAndConditionContent_e: This data product is provided ‘as-is,’ and Statistics Canada makes no warranty, either express or implied, including but not limited to, warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. In no event will Statistics Canada be liable for any direct, special, indirect, consequential or other damages, however caused.
termAndConditionContent_g: Statistics Canada is committed to respecting the privacy of individuals and businesses—whether they are responding to one of our surveys, providing personal information, purchasing a product or service or using our website or mobile application. To fulfill this commitment, Statistics Canada has created a Privacy Framework that describes the approved practices, procedures and governance related to privacy. All personal information collected, used, disclosed or retained by Statistics Canada is protected by the Privacy Act and by the Statistics Act whether it was provided by a respondent or received from a third party.
termAndConditionContent_h: The StatsCAN app does not automatically gather or collect any specific personal information from you, such as your name, phone number or email address, and no personal information is required to access or use the StatsCAN app. We would only obtain this type of information if you supply it by sending us an email or an online form.  Information from such interactions is safeguarded to prevent unauthorized disclosure; for more information regarding how we handle your personal information, please see Statistics Canada’s Privacy notice and Protecting your privacy as a client.
termAndConditionContent_i: Preference information such as your subjects of interest, your preferred language, your settings, including notifications (which are offered on an opt-in basis only, and will be set to “off” by default), will be stored on your device and used to display information according to your preferences. The information you provide while using the StatsCAN app will be used to improve your ongoing user experience and will be stored on your device only. It will not be transmitted to or used by Statistics Canada for any other purpose.
termAndConditionContent_k: Statistics Canada reserves the right to modify or discontinue this app for any reason and without notice.
termAndConditionContent_m: Statistics Canada reserves the right to change these Terms of Use at its sole discretion.  It is your obligation to review the Terms of Use from time to time. Any change to the Terms of Use will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the app following the posting of the changed Terms of Use constitutes your acceptance of the modified Terms of Use.
termAndConditionContent_o: Your use of the content made available to you through this app is governed by the standard terms available from Statistics Canada’s website Terms and conditions.
termAndConditionContent_q: Use of this app is strictly in accordance with its Terms of Use. Users shall not: decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble or attempt to derive the source code from the app; remove, alter or obscure any proprietary notice from any portion of the app; reproduce, modify, improve, enhance or make derivative works based upon the app; distribute, license, lease, sell, resell, transfer, publicly display, transmit or otherwise exploit the app; link to, mirror or frame any portion of the app for any illegal and unauthorized purpose, and agree to comply with all laws, rules and regulations applicable to their use of the app.
termAndConditionContent_s: Statistics Canada may provide periodic updates to this app which may include bug fixes and enhancements.
termAndConditionContent_u: Statistics Canada respects the Official Languages Act and is committed to ensuring that information products of equal quality are available in both English and French.
termAndConditionContent_w: This app and its Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the province of Ontario and applicable laws of Canada. You agree that all actions or proceedings arising directly or indirectly out of these Terms of Use or your use of the app may only be brought in the courts of Ontario or the Federal Court of Canada.
termAndConditionContent_y: The Government of Canada is committed to achieving a high standard of accessibility as defined in the Standard on Optimizing Websites and Applications for Mobile Devices.  In the event of difficulty using our web pages, applications or device-based mobile applications, please contact us at infostats@statcan.gc.ca for assistance or to obtain alternative formats such as regular print, Braille or another appropriate format.
termAndConditionContent_aa: The Government of Canada, its officers, servants, employees and/or agents and contractors shall not be held liable for any injury to any person, including death, or for any loss or damage to any person’s property, incurred or suffered arising out of or in connection with the use of the app. By downloading, accessing or using this app or any page of this app, you signify your assent to this disclaimer. Mobile phone use while driving is widely considered dangerous due to its potential for causing distracted driving and accidents. Activities such as voice calling, texting, web browsing, playing video games, mobile app use or phone use in general can increase the risk of an accident. Use of this app should only be done when appropriate and safe to do so.
termAndConditionContent_cc: Users of the app hereby indemnify and hold harmless Statistics Canada, its officers, servants, employees and/or agents and contractors, from any and all losses, conditions, whether express, implied or statutory, including implied warranties and implied conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
termAndConditionContent_ee: Information presented by Statistics Canada in this app is subject to the Copyright Act.
termAndConditionContent_gg: The official symbols of the Government of Canada, including the Canada Wordmark, the Arms of Canada, and the flag symbol may not be reproduced whether for commercial or non-commercial purposes, without prior written authorization.
termAndConditionContent_ii: Statistics Canada warrants that it is the rightful owner of the app and related documentation that is the subject of this agreement.
termAndConditionContent_kk: The information in this app is provided ‘as is’, and Statistics Canada makes no representations or warranties whatsoever with respect to the information, whether express or implied, in relation to the information and expressly disclaims any implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose of the information.
termAndConditionContent_mm: Should you have any questions, claims or functionality issues relating to this app, please contact us at infostats@statcan.gc.ca.
selectSubjectsToReceiveNotifications: Receive notifications from the subjects you are following.
clearSearchHistoryContent: Your search history will be cleared
regularBusinessHoursInfo:
Monday to Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
(except holidays)

selectSubject: Stay informed! Select your subjects of interest to automatically receive the latest info.
inAppNotificationsDes: You will receive notifications within the app only.
pushNotificationsDes: Includes notifications on home screen, control center and banner.
numberOfNotificationsDes: Corresponds to the number of notifications you will receive, per day.
addNotificationNumber: Adjust the number of push notifications you want to receive.
minusNotificationNumber: Adjust the number of push notifications you want to receive.
subjectsDes: Receive notifications from the subjects you are following.
eventsDes: Get occasional notifications for events hosted by StatsCAN
announcementsDes: Stay on top of the latest announcements from StatsCAN!
dataReleasesDes: Stay up-to-date on the latest data releases from StatsCAN!
reload: Please note that changing the mode will cause the app to reload.
savedScreenMsg: Click the heart icon on a publication to add it to this page so you can refer to it later!
searchScreenMsg:
Find publications published in the StatsCAN app.
Note: A maximum of 20 publications will be shown.
notificationNote: Note: You will receive notifications for subjects you are following and only the latest 25 notifications will be displayed on this screen.
saveItemToast: Added to 'Saved' menu on 'For you' screen
unFollowConfirm: Would you like to stop following
unSaveConfirm: Would you like to remove this item?
resultsFound:
results found
Note: Search results are limited to a maximum of 20.
resultFound:
result found
Note: Search results are limited to a maximum of 20.
noResultFound: No results found. Please check your spelling or try again using different keywords.
subjectUnfollowed: You are no longer following this subject.
sliderText: Use the slider to increase or decrease the size of the text.
subjectInterests: I want to be notified about...
manageSubIntro: Select the subjects you wish to follow:
offLine: Hmm… We can’t detect an Internet connection. Please check your network settings and try again.
serverDown: Couldn’t load the (Screen-name) screen. It’s not you! It’s us. Please check back later.
dataError: Data not found. Please report this error.
internalErr: Well, this is unexpected! We’re working to fix the problem.
sharepubMsg: Interesting publication from StatCan/Publication intéressante de StatCan
playstoreLink:
Do you have the StatsCAN app?/Avez-vous l'appli StatsCAN?
If not, you should download it.
Sinon, vous devriez la télécharger.

StatsCAN

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.statcan.StatCan

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1581143394
